      • setSuffix

        public PeriodicRotatingFileAuditEndpoint.Builder setSuffix​(java.lang.String suffix)
                                                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Set the suffix string. The string is in a format which can be understood by DateTimeFormatter. The period of the rotation is automatically calculated based on the suffix.
        Parameters:
        suffix - the suffix
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the suffix is not valid
